msg: TUSCANY-3056 - Adding missing Geronimo deployment descriptors and fixing existent ones that were using inverse-classloading which was causing issues when deploying samples in geronimo environment

author: mor
msg: Modified the addProductsBackToCategory service to better handle the case of a recevied product not associated to any category, for example the raw material
products MAT_A_COST, MAT_B_COST does not belongs any category.
